comment: Some folks seem to forget that Jesus told his disciples to trade their clothes and buy swords . Why ? To protect themselves . Government persecution is one thing , but this wasn't that . <URL>

comment: Some people also forget that Jesus is the giver of the law at Sinai , where self defense and defense of the helpless was part and parcel of life in Israel .
